Pre-Game Insights: Australia are expected to hand a T20I cap to Tim David
Pant has something to prove for India
Jaffer backs Karthik over Pant in the India XI
Australia might turn up in their usual confident manner at the T20 World Cup
Australia have played just nine T20Is compared to India's 29
Australia are without Mitchell Starc, Mitchell Marsh, and Marcus Stoinis for this series
Tim David's big-hitting skills and ability to take on spinners and quicks make him a must-have in a T20 side
Rishabh Pant has not quite been able to live up to the expectations in the T20 format
India are unlikely to play Umesh Yadav in the XI due to the return of Bumrah and Harshal
Australia are also likely to play Inglis as an opener and push Matthew Wade down the order
Cameron Green has been brought back into the T20I squad
